Name: Closure
About the game: In the dark and mysterious world of Closure, only what you see exists. Manipulate lights to phase objects in and out of reality in this multiple-award-winning puzzle game. Play as a strange spider-like demon who explores the stories of three human characters through beautiful, eerie environments such as a decrepit factory, a murky forest, an abandoned carnival, and the strange, surreal realm that connects them together.
Meta Title: Closure: Sep 7, 2012, Eyebrow Interactive and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Closure? Check out the release date (Sep 7, 2012), developer insights from Eyebrow Interactive, and a complete game summary.
